panels.title: NUM_BATCH_PER_BLOCK
panels.description: Histogram for the number of batches per (committed) blocks.

panels.title: NUM_TXN_PER_BATCH
panels.description: Histogram for the number of transactions per batch.

panels.title: NUM_TXNS_PER_BLOCK
panels.description: Histogram for the number of txns per (committed) blocks.

panels.title: PULLED_TXNS_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the pulled txns.

panels.title: PULLED_EMPTY_TXNS_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the pulled empty txns.

panels.title: CREATED_BATCHES_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the created batches since last restart.

panels.title: CREATED_EMPTY_BATCHES_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the created empty batches since last restart.

panels.title: DELIVERED_BATCHES_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the created batches since last restart.

panels.title: MISSED_BATCHES_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the missed batches when execute.

panels.title: POS_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the proof-of-store (PoS) gathered since last restart.

panels.title: TIMEOUT_BATCHES_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the timeout batches at the sender side.

panels.title: SENT_BATCH_REQUEST_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the number of batch request sent to other nodes.

panels.title: SENT_BATCH_REQUEST_RETRY_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the number of batch request retry sent to other nodes.

panels.title: RECEIVED_BATCH_REQUEST_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the number of batch request received from other nodes.

panels.title: RECEIVED_BATCH_REQUEST_TIMTOUT_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the number of batch request received from other nodes that is timeout.

panels.title: BATCH_CREATION_DURATION
panels.description: Histogram of the time durations for batch creation.

panels.title: EMPTY_BATCH_CREATION_DURATION
panels.description: Histogram of the time durations for empty batch creation.

panels.title: BATCH_TO_POS_DURATION
panels.description: Histogram of the time durations from batch creation to PoS creation.

panels.title: CONSENSUS_CHANNEL_MSGS
panels.description: Counters(queued, dequeued, dropped) related to consensus channel

panels.title: QUORUM_STORE_CHANNEL_MSGS
panels.description: Counters(queued, dequeued, dropped) related to quorum store channel

panels.title: BLOCK_RETRIEVAL_CHANNEL_MSGS
panels.description: Counters(queued, dequeued, dropped) related to block retrieval channel

panels.title: Consensus Message Sent
panels.description: The number of messages sent group by types

panels.title: Consensus Message Received
panels.description: The number of messages received group by types

panels.title: EXPIRED_BATCH_FRAGMENTS_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the expired batch fragments at the receiver side.

panels.title: MISSED_BATCH_FRAGMENTS_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the missed batch fragments at the receiver side.

panels.title: EXCEEDED_STORAGE_QUOTA_COUNT
panels.description: Count of the exceeded storage quota.
